alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Big Horn; Southwestern Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 11 at 1:47AM MST until January 12 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to two inches. * WHERE...Northeastern Yellowstone, Northern Big Horn, and Southwestern Yellowstone. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Roads will likely be slick. Wind chills of 10 to 30 below zero are expected through the period. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will be light and scattered today. Widespread snow will develop this evening and continue into Friday. Watch for possible freeze up ice jams on rivers and streams, which could lead to minor flooding this weekend.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Big Horn; Southwestern Yellowstone
